channel.title: CVE Feed for Corel -- CorelDRAW
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Corel -- CorelDRAW

item.title: CVE-2016-9043|2024-09-16T21:09:07.251Z -- corel -- coreldraw
item.description: An out of bound write vulnerability exists in the EMF parsing functionality of CorelDRAW X8 (CdrGfx - Corel Graphics Engine (64-Bit) - 18.1.0.661). A specially crafted EMF file can cause a vulnerability resulting in potential code execution. An attacker can send the victim a specific EMF file to trigger this vulnerability.
